# INF 550 - Advanced Survey of Ecoinformatics Tools

## Exercise 0.7 - Course Participant Introduction

Howdy! I'm Jalyn Gearries, and I'm a third-year PhD student in Ecoinformatics. I work with Dr. Teki Sankey in the Remote Sensing and Geoinformatics Lab, and I am using in situ plots and remote sensing data to monitor vegetation and treatment efficacy in riparian ecosystems along the Colorado River in Grand Canyon National Park.
